metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37769 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: stress-test master commit e4c878 was discovered to contain a FPE vulnerability via the component combine_inner at /pixman-combine-float.c.

notes.Note: alexmurray> Whilst the CVE description mentions the stress-test binary (which is only part of the test suite in pixman and itself is not distributed in Ubuntu) it is not clear if this is a bug in the underlying library code itself or just in stress-test mdeslaur> New comment in upstream bug does suggest this issue is in the test binary as of 2023-09-22, there is no upstream fix available for this issue

criterions.comment: pixman package in lunar is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
